Package it.polimi.ingsw.view.TUI.Renderables

Class Renderable

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.view.TUI.Renderables.Renderable
All Implemented Interfaces:
CommandObserver, InputObserver, Serializable
Direct Known Subclasses:
CanvasRenderable, ChatRenderable, CommandDisplayRenderable, FormRenderable, GameListRenderable, LeaderboardRenderable, LightGameRenderable, LobbyRenderable, LoggerRenderable, PawnChoiceRenderable, PostGameStateRenderable
public abstract class Renderable extends Object implements InputObserver, CommandObserver, Serializable
Abstract class that represents a renderable object that is an object that can be rendered on the screen and can handle inputs
See Also:

      public void updateInput(String input)
      Method that updates the renderable when a user input is received. This is used only by the CommandDisplayRenderable
      Specified by:
      updateInput in interface InputObserver
      Parameters:
      input - the input to update

      Parameters:

    • getObservedLightModel

      public List<Observed> getObservedLightModel()
      Method that returns the part of the light model that the renderable observes. This method should be overridden by subclasses that observe the light model
      Returns:
      the part of the light model that the renderable observes
